name: Your week in a nutshell
description: With this game I wanted to tell a story which slightly depicted what it is like to learn new information based on vastly different topics for an apathetic student. Although the story does not explicitly focus on the struggles one encounters in school, I used the dialogue portion of the game to communicate themes of restlessness, boredom, and the overall apathetic attitudes the character has towards their monotonous life. There is no direct objective. Just enjoy reading the story through a pixilated gaming environment.
